name: Neon Adrenaline
description:
Neon Adrenaline

A FPS where you are encourage to take risk, go fast and stay in fights. Fight in a world of lights, where you need to manage your ammunition to stay alive!

Made for Game Makers Tool Kit Game JAM

Many update made after jam.

Tips:

To get ammo:

  • Shoot flying bullet.
  • Get shot.

To get health:

  • Run close to enemies, but don't get hit!
  • Never stop moving!

 
 Credits:

Frédéric "Dragon Eyes" Carrier - Everything, also voice (Profession programmer)

Alex "ReichSloth" Harvey - Tester

Nadia "Peanut" Arsenault - Tester

Made with Unity, Gimp and Audacity
